'''Unstitcher''' is a Java utility created to assist in the migration of [[texture pack]]s to the format used in [[Java Edition 1.5]]. This program would split the [[texture atlas]] files <samp>[[terrain.png]]</samp> and <samp>[[items.png]]</samp> into one image file per texture.

* [[Slicer]]
